did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle:
Forest Hills Gardens (New York, N.Y.) records,
1900-1970
1911-1919
did.physdesc: Brochures, specifications, declarations of restrictions, and blueprints.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Brochures, specifications, declarations of restrictions, and blueprints of homes in Forest Hills Gardens.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: Forest Hills Gardens is a planned residential community which was developed by the Russell Sage Foundation in 1908. Laid out on 175 acres in Queens, New York, the community's site plan was designed by Frederick Law Olmsted, Jr.; many of the houses were designed by Grosvenor Atterbury.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Brochures, specifications, declarations of restrictions, and blueprints of homes in Forest Hills Gardens.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Forest Hills Gardens (New York, N.Y.) Records, #2495. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

list.head: Abbreviations used in the collection
list.item: 2nd, A. = Second Floor Plan, Attic Plan,
2nd, R. Pl. = Second Floor Plan, Roof Plan
B. 1st = Basement Floor Plan, First Floor Plan

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIAL
relatedmaterial.p:
See also Forest Hills Gardens Corporation Records, (
#2775).

unittitle.extref: Link to a paper finding aid.

Project Description: House
Architect: S. F. H. Company, Landscaping - Olmsted Bros., Group XII Drawings
Drawings List: Attic Plan, Plan of Flower Box, Elevations of Living, Dining and Bed rooms, Details of Lattice Work. Elevation of Dining room, Dining room Interior, Elevation of Entrance Hall, Section through Main Wing, Parquet Flooring, Details of Stairs, Staircase Section, Misc. Details, Staircase Hall Interior, 5 plates - Chimney Details, Details of Finished Fireplace, Dormer Windows, Living room Interior, Kitchen and Pantry Dressers, Details for China Closet, 2 plates - Hoods over Front and Rear Entrances, 2 plates - Details of steps, Grading Plan, Plan for location of Garage and Revision of Lot Lines
Other Details: Corner Markwood Rd + Greenway north, 4 house group
